entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
